content: **this crochet bandana head scarf is a faster project to work up it uses 2 colors and some interesting stitches that provide it with a vintage classic look ** **size ** written as one size but notes within pattern state how to adjust for size which is just working more or less of a 3-row repeat **dimensions ** 19 / 48 cm x 10 / 25 cm blocked **stitches & techniques used ** chains slip_stitch single_crochet extended single_crochet following special stitch instructions **yarn ** #3 dk weight lion brand coboo 1 affiliate link 51% cotton 49% rayon from bamboo 120 yards total 95 yards a = main color 20 yards b = accent or suitable substitutes **tools ** us size f/5 3 75 mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors blocking materials **other ** **read through all of the pattern notes before beginning** and please contact me if you ever have any questions about one of my patterns follow me on instagram @simplyhookedbyjanet join my facebook community and connect with other crochet enthusiasts https //www facebook com/groups/simplyhookedbyjanet copyright protected you may not redistribute pattern after purchase or publish any part as your own including photos you may sell finished products and if possible reference back to this pattern and/or give credit to simply hooked by janet as the original designer 1 http //shrsl com/4htiw
